name: Tank Runner
description:
This is my first game. And I know it is crap.

But i hope to improve in next games. So any help or suggestions are appreciated.

Also besides below average graphics, I also am weak in sound implementation. Hence this game does not contains any audio. But I may implement in updates (probably). I will try to include audio in next .

So please look forward to playing my games.

**It takes a while to load the game so please be patient. And sorry for the window size. I will take care in my future games. Thank you.
